argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | modadd12d.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) |
| 2 |  | modadd12d.2 | |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) |
| 3 |  | modadd12d.3 | |- ( ph -> C e. RR ) |
| 4 |  | modadd12d.4 | |- ( ph -> D e. RR ) |
| 5 |  | modadd12d.5 | |- ( ph -> E e. RR+ ) |
| 6 |  | modadd12d.6 | |- ( ph -> ( A mod E ) = ( B mod E ) ) |
| 7 |  | modadd12d.7 | |- ( ph -> ( C mod E ) = ( D mod E ) ) |
| 8 | 3 | #P_renegcld | |- ( ph -> -u C e. RR ) |
| 9 | 4 | #P_renegcld | |- ( ph -> -u D e. RR ) |
| 10 | 3, 4, 5, 7 | #P_modnegd | |- ( ph -> ( -u C mod E ) = ( -u D mod E ) ) |
| 11 | 1, 2, 8, 9, 5, 6, 10 | #P_modadd12d | |- ( ph -> ( ( A + -u C ) mod E ) = ( ( B + -u D ) mod E ) ) |
| 12 | 1 | #P_recnd | |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) |
| 13 | 3 | #P_recnd | |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_negsubd | |- ( ph -> ( A + -u C ) = ( A - C ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ph -> ( ( A + -u C ) mod E ) = ( ( A - C ) mod E ) ) |
| 16 | 2 | #P_recnd | |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) |
| 17 | 4 | #P_recnd | |- ( ph -> D e. CC ) |
| 18 | 16, 17 | #P_negsubd | |- ( ph -> ( B + -u D ) = ( B - D ) ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ph -> ( ( B + -u D ) mod E ) = ( ( B - D ) mod E ) ) |
| 20 | 11, 15, 19 | #P_3eqtr3d | |- ( ph -> ( ( A - C ) mod E ) = ( ( B - D ) mod E ) ) |
